data.title: Apaxy
data.content: Apaxy is a customisable theme built to enhance the experience of browsing web directories. It uses the mod_autoindex Apache module—and some CSS—to override the default style of a directory listing.

data.title: Features
data.content: Apaxy may be basic, but it gives you a great deal of creative freedom when styling your directory.
liste: Style your directory listing with CSS.
Make it pop with Javascript or jQuery.
Add welcome messages, download instructions or copyright notices.
Add custom mime type icons (requires editing the .htaccess file)

data.title: Installation
data.content: Apaxy is super easy to install, simply follow the instructions in the in the GitHub repo or in README.md found in the download package.
